title: Pull Request Result
description: Result of creating a pull request. Used by pipeline steps that produce a PR as their final output.

pr_url.description: URL to the created pull request

branch.description: Branch name for the pull request

summary.description: Brief description of what the pull request does

copilot_review_requested.description: Whether a Copilot review was requested for the PR

closes_issue.description: Whether the PR closes a linked issue

issue_number.description: Issue number that this PR addresses
